pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bridging and Extending the CytobankAPI Package in R to the Cytobank Web Application // A collection of tools that leverage the CytobankAPI R package https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/CytobankAPI/vignettes /cytobank-quickstart.html to complete more complex workflows, and add/extend various Cytobank features.
